relevant_findings.rash: Erythematous rash on face and trunk with secondary licheniﬁcation; resolving papular lesions on arms and legs.
relevant_findings.neurological_examination: Mild nuchal rigidity with meningismus; extreme pain on straight-leg raise; bilateral 4/5 strength in hip and knee flexion; ankle dorsiflexion; areflexic in lower extremities with flexor plantar responses bilaterally; sensory examination normal.

relevant_findings.muscle_strength: Nearly plegic in both legs; arm strength remained at 4/5. Continued pain.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weakness progressed to nearly plegic in both legs.

relevant_findings.nerve_conduction_studies: Results essentially unchanged from initial studies; EMG continued to demonstrate widespread fibrillation potentials.

relevant_findings.muscle_strength: Started to improve after initiation of treatment.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Muscular strength started to improve after treatment.

relevant_findings.muscle_strength: Demonstrated full recovery of strength at follow-up examination.
